trends: There have been 112 other sightings in Orlando
There were no other sightings in Orlando on or around November 13th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was walking my dog about 6:10pm on 11\13\12 and was watching a jet land, as i like to do, and noticed an orange ball out of the corner of my eye. it had no blinking lights so i knew it wasn't a plane and it followed the tree tops...i watched it for about 5 seconds and when i turned to leave saw several "fireballs" come out of the atmosphere. i stood there in awe watching as one, then three were what looked like they were :"flicked" out of the atmosphere...i ran to get my camera and got a pic and video but it doesn't do justice to what i saw...they were following each other once they came into the atmosphere and were slow moving...i ran around one of the condo buildings to video but they were heading west. whatever i saw was beautiful and lasted about 5 minutes. to answer the questions on the left sidelink: 1. walking my dog 2. i was watching a jet land but something moving in the sky to the left caught my eye 3. i thought it strange that it was orange and had no blinking lights like a plane 4. when i saw them come into the atmosphere, i tought they moved together like bubbles but in a line 5. seeing what i saw at first was surreal and i stood there dumbfounded until i thought to go get my camera, then while trying to get pictures, my heart was pounding and i forgot all about how to iso my camera!! after, when i calmed down, i thought how beautiful the orbs were!! 6. i followed them as they headed west.
Summary: Walking dog and watching a jet land saw orange ball out of corner of eye, then fireballs....
